025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.Set;
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030
031import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
032
033import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
034import com.sun.source.doctree.UnknownBlockTagTree;
035import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
036
037/**
038 * A base class that implements the {@link Taglet} interface.
039 */
040public class BaseTaglet implements Taglet {
041
042    protected final DocTree.Kind tagKind;
043    protected final String name;
044    private final boolean inline;
045    private final Set<Location> sites;
046
047    BaseTaglet(DocTree.Kind tagKind, boolean inline, Set<Location> sites) {
048        this(tagKind.tagName, tagKind, inline, sites);
049    }
050
051    BaseTaglet(String name, boolean inline, Set<Location> sites) {
052        this(name, inline ? DocTree.Kind.UNKNOWN_INLINE_TAG
053            : DocTree.Kind.UNKNOWN_BLOCK_TAG, inline, sites);
054    }
055
056    private BaseTaglet(String name, DocTree.Kind tagKind, boolean inline,
057            Set<Location> sites) {
058        this.name = name;
059        this.tagKind = tagKind;
060        this.inline = inline;
061        this.sites = sites;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() {
066        return sites;
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public final boolean inField() {
071        return sites.contains(Location.FIELD);
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public final boolean inConstructor() {
076        return sites.contains(Location.CONSTRUCTOR);
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public final boolean inMethod() {
081        return sites.contains(Location.METHOD);
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public final boolean inOverview() {
086        return sites.contains(Location.OVERVIEW);
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public final boolean inModule() {
091        return sites.contains(Location.MODULE);
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public final boolean inPackage() {
096        return sites.contains(Location.PACKAGE);
097    }
098
099    @Override
100    public final boolean inType() {
101        return sites.contains(Location.TYPE);
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public final boolean isInlineTag() {
106        return inline;
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public String getName() {
111        return name;
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Returns the kind of trees recognized by this taglet.
116     *
117     * @return the kind of trees recognized by this taglet
118     */
119    public DocTree.Kind getTagKind() {
120        return tagKind;
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Returns whether or not this taglet accepts a {@code DocTree} node.
125     * The taglet accepts a tree node if it has the same kind, and
126     * if the kind is {@code UNKNOWN_BLOCK_TAG} the same tag name.
127     *
128     * @param tree the tree node
129     * @return {@code true} if this taglet accepts this tree node
130     */
131    public boolean accepts(DocTree tree) {
132        return (tree.getKind() == DocTree.Kind.UNKNOWN_BLOCK_TAG
133            && tagKind == DocTree.Kind.UNKNOWN_BLOCK_TAG)
134                ? ((UnknownBlockTagTree) tree).getTagName().equals(name)
135                : tree.getKind() == tagKind;
136    }
137
138    /**
139     * {@inheritDoc}
140     *
141     * @implSpec This implementation throws {@link UnsupportedTagletOperationException}.
142     */
143    @Override
144    public Content getInlineTagOutput(Element element, DocTree tag,
145            TagletWriter writer) {
146        throw new UnsupportedTagletOperationException(
147            "Method not supported in taglet " + getName() + ".");
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * {@inheritDoc}
152     *
153     * @implSpec This implementation throws {@link UnsupportedTagletOperationException}
154     */
155    @Override
156    public Content getAllBlockTagOutput(Element holder, TagletWriter writer) {
157        throw new UnsupportedTagletOperationException(
158            "Method not supported in taglet " + getName() + ".");
159    }
160}
